naslov: Samobor - 7-sobna kuća (450 m2) - VRT - GARAŽA - PARKING (iznajmljivanje)
opis: DOSTUPNO OD 15.03.2025. Agencija Zagreb4U predstavlja samostojeću kuću (450 m2) s okućnicom, Samobor. VIRTUALNA ŠETNJA: u izradi LOKACIJA: mirni, zeleni dio Samobora, na par minuta vožnje od centra Samobora. KUĆA SE SASTOJI OD: PRIZEMLJA: stana za goste sa spavaćom sobom, kuhinje, dnevnog boravka i kupaonice, kotlovnice, vešeraja, spremišta i garaže, 1. KAT: kuhinje, blagovaonice i dnevnog boravka, kupaonice s wc-om i dvije velike terase, 2. KAT: 3 spavaće sobe, radna soba, velika kupaonica s wc-om. NAMJEŠTAJ I OPREMA: kuća je namještena. Uređaji koji se u njoj nalaze: ploča za kuhanje, pećnica, hladnjak, perilica posuđa i perilica rublja. REŽIJE: nisu uključene u cijenu najma i plaćaju se dodatno. UOBIČAJENI UVJETI NAJMA: * Ugovor na rok od minimalno godinu dana * Plaćanje: 1 mjesec unaprijed * Sigurnosni polog: 1 mjesečna najamnina AGENCIJSKA PROVIZIJA OD NAJMOPRIMCA: 1 MJESEČNA NAJAMNINA + PDV ----------------------------------------------------------------- AVAILBLE FROM MARCH 15TH 2025. The Zagreb4U agency presents a detached house (450 m2) with a garden, Samobor. VIRTUAL WALK: under construction LOCATION: a quiet, green part of Samobor, a few minutes' drive from the center of Samobor. THE HOUSE CONSISTS OF: GROUND FLOOR: guest apartment with bedroom, kitchen, living room and bathroom, boiler room, laundry room, storage room and garage, 1ST FLOOR: kitchen, dining room and living room, bathroom with toilet and two large terraces, 2ND FLOOR: 3 bedrooms, study, large bathroom with toilet. FURNITURE AND EQUIPMENT: the house is furnished. Appliances in it: hob, oven, refrigerator, dishwasher and washing machine. UTILITIES: are not included in the rental price and are paid additionally. USUAL CONDITIONS OF RENT: * Contract for a minimum of one year * Payment: 1 month in advance * Security deposit: 1 monthly rent AGENCY FEE: 1 MONTHLY RENT + VAT
naziv_agencije: Zagreb4U - PREMIUM REAL ESTATE, VISOKA KLASA d.o.o.
